Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. It's worth more than $80 to us, and we believe it could be just as valuable to you. Considering its quality and potential benefits, I propose a price of $120 for this exclusive item. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and bring significant value to your life or work. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
